---
title: "Stage 2"
---

Single honours students take all six modules listed below. Combined honours students take modules marked \* as well as one 20-credit module per semester in their minor subject.

### Semester 1

PSYC514: Individual Differences, Social and Developmental Psychology\*

PSYC519: Research Methods in Practice 1\*

PSYC515: Health and Wellbeing

### Semester 2

PSYC513: Cognition and Biological Psychology\*

PSYC520: Research Methods in Practice 2\*

PSYC516: Applied Psychology
